name: Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU'S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Phoenix Arms
name_abbreviation: Oliver v. Lou's of Upper Darby, Inc.

parties: Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU’S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Phoenix Arms.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Application for Relief
AND NOW, this 13th day of February, 2008, the Application for Relief is DENIED.
Justice McCAFFERY dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 893
Anthony OLIVER, Sr., Administrator of the Estate of Anthony Daniel Oliver, Jr., Deceased, and Anthony Oliver, Sr., and Sherree Goode, in their Own Right, Respondents v. LOU’S OF UPPER DARBY, INC. and Phoenix Arms Petition of Phoenix Arms.
No. 151 EM 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 13, 2008.
